section.heading: Child care for foster parents attending meetings or training

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.13 > Section 74.13.315 74.13.310 << 74.13.315 >> 74.13.325 PDF RCW 74.13.315 Child care for foster parents attending meetings or training. The department may provide child care for all foster parents who are required to attend department-sponsored meetings or training sessions. If the department does not provide such child care, the department, where feasible, shall conduct the activities covered by this section in the foster parent's home or other location acceptable to the foster parent. [ 2018 c 284 s 51 ; 2009 c 520 s 79 ; 1997 c 272 s 6 .] NOTES: Effective date — 1997 c 272: See note following RCW 74.13.031 .
